description:
Registering a Duel Algorithm Listener

To add a custom duel algorithm, create a listener that appends your algorithm instance to the $algorithms array. This array is passed by reference, so your additions will affect the main list of algorithms.

Example listener

class DuelAlgorithms
{
    public static function register(\XF\App $app, array &$algorithms): void
    {
        $algorithms[] = new CheatAlgorithm();
    }
}

For a full explanation of duel algorithms and how to implement them, see the Duel Algorithms Wiki page.
